Text: All other countries are helping its citizens during Covid19 crisis. They are giving rebate on utility bills ; taxes, reducing Gas ; fuel prices.But in India the Govt is LOOTING the middle class ; the poor, by increasing price of LPG and Diesel ; Petrol. #LPG_Petrol_Loot
